net.neto_framework

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.neto_framework.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    An interface to send and receive data from TCP and UDP.
    Author:
    BleedObsidian (Jesse Prescott)
